user_query: I'm writing a humorous article and I need some funny material. Fetch me a variety of random jokes, Chuck Norris jokes, and funny insults. Also, generate a 'Pet Pet' meme with the image of a funny animal.

TaskList.description: Fetch a variety of random jokes from a jokes API.
Fetch Chuck Norris jokes from a specialized jokes API.
Fetch a selection of funny insults from an insults API.
Generate a 'Pet Pet' meme with the image of a selected funny animal from an image API.
